name: kingjackhammer
text: Lyle is my favorite character. He knows how to live.

name: spinynorman
text: Honestly, yes. Onstad's description of Lyle's actions (especially "Two scoundrels got fresh with a chain-smoking trailer-pixie who later attacked them when they said that her arms were all skinny like a tall dog's leg") have the ugly, measured cadence of a Tom Waits rap. I can hear him practically snarling "It's Jacks pint night at the Scow and I ain't want to get booted." Sort of like a Southern Shan Macgowan maybe, with more teeth in his face and more piss in his pants.

name: philophobe
text:
The Pogues would indeed make a great soundtrack to so much of Achewood. You are Correct.

(Right now in my brain is running certain of the mass-brawling strips of the GOF arc to the tune of "Turkish Song of the Damned." Ace.)

name: closefriend
text: This is the best strip Achewood has had yet. I only regret that Lemmy's too busy to take on his mayoral duties, and frankly it's causing Drinkin' Island to lose tourist traffic to Girls Gone Wild Island.

name: nigelchaos
text: GGW Island is painted like the whore of babylon

name: klaus
text: This is my favorite Flowchart so far. Everything leads to DRINKIN' ISLAND!

name: equinn2006
text: OH MY GOD I SEE IT

name: the_doz
text: Lemmy.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sevenarts, isunklower, StagnantDisplay, atypicaloracle, gkiyo)

name: lastlarf
text: I gave a hefty sum to sponsor Lemmy's mayoral campaign.

name: lacrimus
text: There's an infinite loop of Lyle terrifying a college kid with little glasses.

name: howard
text:
Unless he lets it slide.

But to be fair no-one should let that shit slide.

name: orvel
text:
Nah, he repeats the loop until he is too drunk and must let it slide.

Also, accidental lame. It happens.

name: mangtastic
text: But metallica does suck.

name: zapatos
text: I was going to say that.  They way suck.

name: griffypoo
text: WHO THE FUCK SAID THAT?

name: nurdbot
text: I want to know who was running against Lemmy?

name: tellumo
text: Everyone else withdrew the day he announced his candidacy.

name: shutup_shutup
text: People don't run against Lemmy. They run from him.

name: evilrobot
text: This strip confirmed that Lyle is actually the character I have most likely drank with until 10 AM.

name: riazm
text: I am the college guy with little glasses, overconfidently mouthing off about some band and then immediately taking it back when someone calls me out.

name: aelindil
text:
Riazm, are you ever... honest with yourself? About everything?

(yes. yes you are.)

name: awko
text: Lemmy should always get a 5.

name: soilentshuggah
text: Best flowchart.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I always thought of Lyle as a strictly Cliff Burton-era Metallica fan. You know, the "Alcoholica" period.

name: anzio
text: It is the best period after all.

name: doncaballero
text: I just love how the starting point for all of Lyle's decisions is "Fuck You!"

name: stuart
text: It's a... FUCK YOU FRIDAY DECISION MAKING FLOWCHART - LYLE EDITION

name: rarelement
text: It is actually Fuck You Friday today! Time to make a decision.

name: mauricesnail
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: kreuzkopf
text: Who wouldn't love to hang with Lyle and Todd? Just make sure you pass out on your side.

name: spinynorman
text: Never has such ugliness been described with so much beauty

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I like how without the interruption of the college kid pint Jack night leads directly to a blackout.

name: mountaindewtab
text: old time rhymin box

name: toughasnails001
text: "Drinkin' Island is inside each of us, my son" is one of the top Achewood phrases I hope to one day have the opportunity to use in real life.

name: mercuri0us
text: Only when you do they will just give you funny looks.  A sad fact of life.

name: thesyndicate88
text: Can anyone explain why the term 'Mutual Harassment' made me laugh so hard? I really don't get it.

name: goocifer
text: I figured every branch would end on the blackout box if that is indeed what it is.  After drinking island there would be a huge tangle of decision lines that get denser and denser and ends on the box.  And then a box that says "inspect vomit for matchbox cars."

name: dueledge
text: Shit I lamed instead of chubbied again, well thats what happens when youre drunk. wait I only had one 500ml beer, man that is lame.

name: divot
text: HOW DID I MISS THIS ONE THE FIRST TIME AROUND

name: mrklaw
text: FUCK YOU!

name: iidebaser
text: this one is a masterpiece.  the "two scoundrels" box, especially, is a fucking brilliant little bit of writing.

name: phthoggos
text: Let's be honest, though, Metallica started sucking with 1991's "Metallica"

name: achilleselbow
text: Yes! It sucks so much that no one else realizes this! You have no idea how much it pisses me off when I hear some doucherag start going on about "the good old stuff like the black album". God damn shitty arena blues rock is what that is.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Huh?  Everyone I know who likes Metallica always says the Black Album was the "sell out" album.  I thought this was pretty well known.

name: kickstart
text: Heh, my dad's name is Mike and we are from Iowa.  I will be careful not to ask him about Crawler.

name: tad-
text: I think this is my favorite flowchart of the three so far. It expands on what we already know about Lyle's character, and it does it so well that you're seriously in a tough spot not to laugh out loud watching him go to Drinkin' Island.

name: goro
text: My 5 is for the chopper made of bones.

name: i_love_kate
text:
*scroll up*
*scroll down*
*scroll up*
*scroll down again*

What?

name: i_love_kate
text: Heh, I would read the alt text directly after posting this.

name: bozendoka
text: That is exactly how I picture Lemmy at all times: riding a chopper made of bones.

name: fatcat
text:
A BOOM BOOM BOOM

Also; is it just me or does Lyle fall into a cycle of beating up Metallica-haters sometime after Drinkin' Island.

Not that they don't have it comin'.
